posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,
I recently had my OMSL subset slabbed SGC, cards look great in all new uniform holders, however my Revelle was too ugly to send so I’m hoping to find a decent example to upgrade this guy.  Raw or Graded works, I can always have it re-slabbed to match the set.

And while I think this Westlake card looks amazing and should have graded a 1 only due to that one darn corner, it did not, and its now my only southern leaguer sitting in an A holder, so it needs to go. 

Any help finding these two in decent condition is much appreciated

Thanks All

Colton
[url]Nineunder71@hotmail.com[/url]

.

In hopes of being able to keep this Westlake, I’ve decided to send him in for a ‘review’ This is my first attempt at this, we’ll see how it goes. Hopefully, he comes back a 1 and gets to stay in the collection, fingers crossed. 

On to ELLAM, this guy got a 1, but in my opinion is the ugliest of my 1’s, so while I wait to see what happens with Westlake I will look to upgrade ole Roy

Any help is Much Appreciated, thx All

Upgraded ELLAM here on the board, thanks CrackaJackKid!!

Really Just Looking for Revelle Now, thanks all 

PS ~ The ELLAM above has SOLD
